channel.title: Arrested for stealing water
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VcC1sXsu6Sw
What the fuck? This is sad.

item.title: Arrested for stealing water
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:10, topic:353089”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=449402.msg3299328#msg3299328 date=1281189021]

[quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=449402.msg3299323#msg3299323 date=1281188860]

[quote author=jme link=topic=449402.msg3299264#msg3299264 date=1281184470]
Just because he has a kid, doesn’t mean they should let the criminal go free. But I don’t know the whole story to his arrest. That’s why I don’t make conclusions from grainy short edited youtube videos.
[/quote]They cut off the water supplies down there, So I’m guessing he stole water for his family else there’s a high chance they would of died.
[/quote]But he’s saying there might be more to the story, like he fought police when they tried to arrest him.
[/quote]Well ofcourse they might of been, But let me remind you; These people do not have weapon’s, they fight against tanks with stones, rocks ect. I doubt they would attack the troops in the first place.[/quote]It was just an example… there are many things that could have happened.

Read full topic

I doubt they would attack the troops in the first place.
